items.sentence: Tom told me that he could get us what we need.
Tom touched the hot stove and burned his hand.
Tom tried opening the door, but it was locked.
Tom tried to open the door, but it was locked.
Tom might be able to tell us where Mary lives.
Tom must be getting used to doing this by now.
When I told Tom that, he didn\'t say anything.
Tom should have discussed it with his parents.
Tom studied French for three hours last night.
Tom teaches French at the school Mary goes to.
